sentences: Toote vormistamisel tuleb arvestada ka selle omadega.
See toode on mõeldud spetsiaalselt materjalide ja nende omadega töötamiseks.
Kui tean asja omadega, saan paremini hindama olukorda.
context: 'omadega' is the inessive form of 'omadus', meaning 'property' or 'feature'. It translates to 'with properties/features/characteristics'. Commonly used when referring to characteristics inherent to a thing or person.
